mapper.insert: insert into tbl_meetingroom_reservation(reserno, startdate, enddate, r_content, fk_employee_no, fk_roomno) values(seq_reserno.nextval, to_date(#{startdate}, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{enddate}, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss'), #{r_content}, #{fk_employee_no}, #{fk_roomno})
mapper.select: select to_char(startdate, 'hh24:mi') as startdate, to_char(enddate, 'hh24:mi') as enddate, fk_roomno from tbl_meetingroom_reservation where to_char(startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(#{startdate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
